list.title: module:connection~Connection#open
list.description:
Open a connection using the transport defined open method.
Users do not need to call this method, since the connection is opened by Janode.connect().

list.title: module:connection~Connection#sendRequest
list.description: Send a request from this connection using the transport defined send method.

list.title: module:connection~Connection#startPcap
list.description: (Admin API) Start a packet capture on an handle.

list.title: module:connection~Connection#stopPcap
list.description: Stop an ogoing packet capture.

Stub handleMessage (it is overriden by specific plugin handlers).
Implementations must return falsy values for unhandled events and truthy value
for handled events.

list.title: module:janode
list.description:
This module is the entry point of the Janode library.
Users start by importing the library and using the functions and properties exported by this module.

list.title: module:janode.EVENT
list.description: Events emitted by Janode

list.title: module:janode.Logger
list.description: The Logger used in Janode.

list.title: module:janode~PluginDescriptor
list.description: The plugin descriptor used when attaching a plugin from a session.

list.title: module:janode~RawConfiguration
list.description: The configuration passed by the user.

list.title: module:janode~ServerObjectConf
list.description: An object describing a janus server (e.g. url, secret).

list.title: module:janode~connect
list.description:
Connect using a defined configuration.
The input configuration can be an object or an array. In case it is an array and the param "key" is provided, Janode will pick a server configuration according to "key" type. If it is a number it will pick the index "key" of the array. If it is a string it will pick the server configuration that matches the "server_key" property. In case "key" is missing, Janode will fallback to index 0.

list.title: module:logger~Logger#debug
list.description:
Debug logging.
It is a wrapper for `console.debug()`.

list.title: module:logger~Logger#error
list.description:
Error logging.
It is a wrapper for `console.error()`.

list.title: module:logger~Logger#info
list.description:
Info logging (default).
It is a wrapper for `console.info()`.

list.title: module:logger~Logger#setLevel
list.description: Set level of logger.

list.title: module:logger~Logger#setLogLevel
list.description: Alias for setLevel.

list.title: module:logger~Logger#verb
list.description: Alias for verbose.

list.title: module:logger~Logger#verbose
list.description:
Verbose logging.
It is a wrapper for `console.debug()`.

list.title: module:logger~Logger#warn
list.description: Alias for warning.

list.title: module:logger~Logger#warning
list.description:
Warning logging.
It is a wrapper for `console.warn()`.

list.title: module:protocol
list.description:
This module contains several Janus constants related to the Janus/Admin API and Janode, like:
- Janus request names
- Janus response names
- Janus event names
- Janode event names
Some helper methods related to the protocols are defined here too.

list.title: module:protocol~JANODE.EVENT
list.description: Janode core events.

list.title: module:protocol~JANUS.ACK
list.description: Janus temporary response (ack)

list.title: module:protocol~JANUS.ADMIN
list.description: Janus Admin API requests

list.title: module:protocol~JANUS.EVENT
list.description: Janus events

list.title: module:protocol~JANUS.REQUEST
list.description: Janus API requests

list.title: module:protocol~JANUS.RESPONSE
list.description: Janus definitive responses

list.title: module:session~Session

list.title: module:session~Session#attach
list.description:
Attach a plugin in this session using a plugin descriptor.
If the Handle param is missing, a new generic Handle will be attached.
Returns a promise with the pending attach operation.

list.description: Clear the internal transaction table and the debugging printing task.

list.title: module:tmanager~TransactionManager#closeAllTransactionsWithError
list.description:
Close all the stored transactions with an error.
If an owner is specified only the owner's transaction will be closed.
The closed transactions will be removed from the internal table.

list.title: module:tmanager~TransactionManager#closeTransactionWithError
list.description:
Close a transaction with an error if the id is found and the owner matches.
The closed transaction will be removed from the internal table and the error cb will be invoked with the error string.

list.title: module:tmanager~TransactionManager#closeTransactionWithSuccess
list.description:
Close a transaction with success if the id is found and the owner matches.
The closed transaction will be removed from the internal table and the success cb will be invoked with the specified data.

list.title: module:tmanager~TransactionManager#createTransaction
list.description: Create a new transaction if id does not exist in the table and add it to the TM.

list.title: module:tmanager~TransactionManager#delete
list.description: Delete a specific transaction from the TM.

list.title: module:tmanager~TransactionManager#get
list.description: Get a specific transaction from the TM.

list.title: module:tmanager~TransactionManager#getTransactionOwner
list.description: Get the owner of a specific transaction id.

list.title: module:tmanager~TransactionManager#has
list.description: Check if the TM has a specific transaction.

list.title: module:tmanager~TransactionManager#set
list.description: Add a pending transaction to the TM.

list.title: module:tmanager~TransactionManager#size
list.description: Get the current size of the transaction table.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#_attemptOpen
list.description:
Internal helper to open a unix socket connection.
In case of error retry the connection with another address from the available pool.
If maximum number of attempts is reached, throws an error.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#_attempts
list.description: Internal counter for connection attempts.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#_closed
list.description: A boolean flag indicating that the connection has been closed.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#_closing
list.description: A boolean flag indicating that the connection is being closed.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#_connection
list.description: The parent  Janode connection.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#_initUnixSocket
list.description: Initialize the internal socket.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#_local_bind
list.description: The local file to bind the socket to.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#_opened
list.description: A boolean flag indicating that the connection has been opened.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#_opening
list.description: A boolean flag indicating that the connection is being opened.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#_socket
list.description: The internal Unix Socket.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#close
list.description:
Gracefully close the connection.
It is called from the parent connection.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#getRemoteHostname
list.description:
Get the remote Janus hostname.
It is called from the parent connection.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#id
list.description: A numerical identifier assigned for logging purposes.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#name
list.description: A more descriptive, not unique string (used for logging).

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#open
list.description: Open a transport connection. This is called from parent connection.

list.title: module:transport-unix~TransportUnix#send
list.description:
Send a request from this connection.
It is called from the parent connection.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_attemptOpen
list.description:
Internal helper to open a websocket connection.
In case of error retry the connection with another address from the available pool.
If maximum number of attempts is reached, throws an error.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_attempts
list.description: Internal counter for connection attempts.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_closed
list.description: A boolean flag indicating that the connection has been closed.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_closing
list.description: A boolean flag indicating that the connection is being closed.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_connection
list.description: The parent  Janode connection.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_initWebSocket
list.description:
Initialize the internal WebSocket.
Wraps with a promise the standard WebSocket API opening.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_opened
list.description: A boolean flag indicating that the connection has been opened.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_opening
list.description: A boolean flag indicating that the connection is being opened.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_ping
list.description:
Send a ws ping frame.
This API is only available when the library is not used in a browser.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_ping_task
list.description: The task of the peridic ws ping.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_setPingTask
list.description: Set a ws ping-pong task.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_unsetPingTask
list.description: Remove the ws ping task.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#_ws
list.description: The internal WebSocket connection.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#close
list.description:
Gracefully close the connection.
Wraps with a promise the standard WebSocket API "close".
It is called from the parent connection.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#getRemoteHostname
list.description:
Get the remote Janus hostname.
It is called from the parent connection.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#id
list.description: A numerical identifier assigned for logging purposes.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#name
list.description: A more descriptive, not unique string (used for logging).

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#open
list.description: Open a transport connection. This is called from parent connection.

list.title: module:transport-ws~TransportWs#send
list.description:
Send a request from this connection.
Wraps with a promise the standard WebSocket API "send".
It is called from the parent connection.

list.title: module:utils.checkUrl
list.description: Check if a url string contains one of the protocols in a white list.

list.title: module:utils.delayOp
list.description: Return a promise that will resolve after a given amount of milliseconds.

list.title: module:utils.getCliArgument
list.description: Get a CLI argument.

list.title: module:utils.getNumericID
list.description:
Return (and increment) the value of a counter, starting from a random seed.
The counter starts from 0 after reaching Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER.

list.title: module:utils.newIterator
list.description: Generate a circular iterator from an array.

list.title: module:utils.randomString
list.description: Generate a random alpha-numeric string with a given length.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin
list.description: This module contains the implementation of the VideoRoom plugin (ref. {@link https://janus.conf.meetecho.com/docs/videoroom.html}).

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin
list.description: The exported plugin descriptor.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~RtpForwarder
list.description: Descriptrion of an active RTP forwarder.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_ALLOWED
list.description: The response event for ACL tokens edit (allowed) request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_CONFIGURED
list.description: The response event for publisher/subscriber configure request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_CREATED
list.description: The response event for room create request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_DESTROYED
list.description: The response event for room destroy request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_EXISTS
list.description: The response event for room exists request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_KICKED
list.description: The response event for the kick request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_LEAVING
list.description: The response event for publiher/subscriber leave request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_LIST
list.description: The response event for videoroom list request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_PARTICIPANTS_LIST
list.description: The response event to a participant list request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_PAUSED
list.description: The response event for subscriber pause request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_PUB_JOINED
list.description: The response event when a publisher has joined.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_RECORDING_ENABLED_STATE
list.description: The response event for the recording enabled request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_RTP_FWD_LIST
list.description: The response event for RTP forwarders list request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_RTP_FWD_STARTED
list.description: The response event for RTP forward start request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_RTP_FWD_STOPPED
list.description: The response event for RTP forward stop request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_STARTED
list.description: The response event for subscriber start request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_SUB_JOINED
list.description: The response event when a subscriber has joined.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_SWITCHED
list.description: The response event for subscriber switch request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_UNPUBLISHED
list.description: The response event for publisher unpublish request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VIDEOROOM_EVENT_UPDATED
list.description: [multistream] The response event for update subscriber request.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle
list.description: Create a Janode VideoRoom handle.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#allow
list.description: Edit the ACL tokens for a room.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#configure
list.description:
Configure a publisher or subscriber handle.
Room is detected from the context since a handle must have joined before.
Can also be used by publishers to publish a feed.
Use this API also to trigger ICE restarts. Publishers can omit the restart/update flags, while subscribers need to use them to force the operation.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#create
list.description: Create a new room.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#destroy
list.description: Destroy a room.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#enable_recording
list.description: Enable or disable recording for all participants in a room while the conference is in progress.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_CONFIGURED
list.description: A handle received a configured event.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_DESTROYED
list.description: The videoroom has been destroyed.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_DISPLAY
list.description: A participant has changed the display name.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_ERROR
list.description: A generic videoroom error.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_KICKED
list.description: A feed has been kicked out.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_LEAVING
list.description: A peer has left the room.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_PUB_LIST
list.description: Active publishers list updated.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_PUB_PEER_JOINED
list.description: A peer has joined theh room (notify-joining).

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_RECORDING_ENABLED_STATE
list.description: Conference recording has been enabled or disabled.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_SC_SUBSTREAM_LAYER
list.description: A switch to a different simulcast substream has been completed.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_SC_TEMPORAL_LAYERS
list.description: A switch to a different number of simulcast temporal layers has been completed.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_SLOWLINK
list.description: A handle received a slow link notification.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_TALKING
list.description: Notify if the current user is talking.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_UNPUBLISHED
list.description: A feed has been unpublished.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#event:VIDEOROOM_UPDATED
list.description: A multistream subscription has been updated.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#exists
list.description: Check if a room exists.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#feed
list.description: Either the feed identifier assigned to this publisher handle or the publisher's feed in case this handle is a subscriber.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#joinConfigurePublisher
list.description: Join and configure videoroom handle as publisher.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#joinListener
list.description: Alias for "joinSubscriber".

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#joinPublisher
list.description: Join a videoroom as publisher.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#joinSubscriber
list.description: Join a room as subscriber.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#kick
list.description: Kick a publisher out from a room.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#leave
list.description:
Leave a room.
Can be used by both publishers and subscribers.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#list
list.description: List all the available rooms.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#listForward
list.description: List the active forwarders in a room.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#listParticipants
list.description: List the participants inside a room.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#pause
list.description: Pause a subscriber feed.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#publish
list.description:
Publish a feed in the room.
Room is detected from the context since a handle must have joined before.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#room
list.description: The identifier of the videoroom the handle has joined.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#start
list.description: Start a subscriber stream.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#startForward
list.description: Start a RTP forwarding in a room.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#stopForward
list.description: Stop a RTP forwarder in a room.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#streams
list.description:
[multistream]
Either the streams assigned to this publisher handle or the streams subscribed to in case this handle is a subscriber.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#switch
list.description: Switch to another feed.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#unpublish
list.description: Unpublish a feed in the room.

list.title: module:videoroom-plugin~VideoRoomHandle#update
list.description: [multistream] Update a subscription.
